description.value:
You can open or energize a notable third eye on your forehead to strike with storming power. You deal @Damage[(ceil(@actor.level/2))d4[electricity]|traits:area-damage] or @Damage[(ceil(@actor.level/2))d4[sonic]|traits:area-damage] damage in a @Template[cone|distance:15]; Storming Gaze gains this trait. Each creature in the area must attempt a @Check[reflex|against:class-spell|basic] saving throw against the higher of your class DC or spell DC. You can't use this ability again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Storming Gaze]]{1d4 rounds}.

At 7th level and every 2 levels thereafter, the damage increases by 1d4.
